H0.text: Mars is the center of our solar system.

H1.text: The moon is the center of our solar system.

H2.text: Jupiter is the center of our solar system.

H3.text: The sun is the center of our solar system.

A4.text: Over 99.86% of the Solar System's mass is located within the Sun.

A5.text: The Solar System includes the Sun and all objects that are bound to it by gravity and orbit it.
